dct_title_s: A plan of New York Island, part of Long Island, &c. : shewing the position of the American and British armies before, at, and after the engagement on the Heights, Aug. 27, 1776
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. From: The life of George Washington / by John Marshall. Philadelphia : Printed and published by C.P. Wayne ..., 1807. Plate II. In central upper margin: Engraved for Washington's Life.
dct_subject_sm: Long Island, Battle of, New York, N.Y., 1776—Maps
dcat_theme_sm: Long Island, Battle of, New York, N.Y., 1776—Maps
